name: Sony Network Camera Video
summary: Learn about .M4F files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: Sony produces a variety of CCTV cameras that businesses, government agencies, and other organizations use for surveillance. These cameras are sometimes referred to as SNCs (Sony Network Cameras). SNCs often save videos they record as M4F files.

description: An M4F file is a video created by a Sony networked surveillance camera, such as the SNC-CH140 or SNC-CH280. M4F videos are typically high definition (HD), with a resolution of 1280x720, and have a 16:9 aspect ratio.

instructions: You can play the video an M4F file contains in SNC Video Player (Windows). SNC Video Player is a free, Sony-provided SNC emulator.
